rule1.message: Do not start a sentence with "With."

examples.positive: Windows Hello enables you to improve efficiency.
examples.negative: With Windows Hello, your efficiency is improved.

examples.positive: Run Windows in the safe mode.
examples.negative: Run Windows in safe mode.

searchConditions.condition: , as shown in the following figure>

rule3.message: Add a comma (,) before "as shown in the following."

examples.positive: You can open Word through shortcut, as shown in the following figure.

rule4.message: Do not use a comma before "shown in the following."

examples.positive: The data is exported shown in the following figure.

rule5.message: When describing something that is created by users, use "user-defined".

examples.positive: To use user-defined rules, import them first.
examples.negative: To use self-built rules, import them first.

rule6.message: Replace with the actual operation, such as "click" and "delete."

examples.positive: You can manage ECS in the following ways.
examples.negative: You can operate ECS in the following ways.

examples.positive: To do this, follow these steps:
examples.negative: Use the steps as follows.

examples.positive: On the Edit page, change your display name.
examples.negative: In the Edit page, change your display name.

examples.positive: In the Manage VM dialog box. click Stop.
examples.negative: On the Manage VM dialog box, click Stop.

rule10.message: Use the sentence pattern "For more information about xxx, see xxx."

examples.positive: For more information about common response parameters, see Common parameters.
examples.negative: For common response parameters, see Common parameters.

rule11.message: A state must start with an uppercase letter.

examples.positive: Change the VM to the Available state
examples.negative: Change the VM to the available state

rule12.message: Do not use "text box" to refer to "field."

examples.positive: Enter a data parsing script in the Edit Script field.
examples.negative: Enter a data parsing script in the Edit Script text box.

examples.positive: Enter a security group name in the Security Group Name field.
examples.negative: Enter a security group name in the Security Group Name text box.

rule13.message: Spell as "text box." Do not use "text box" to refer to "field."

examples.positive: Enter a data parsing script in the Edit Script field.
examples.negative: Enter a data parsing script in the Edit Script textbox.

examples.positive: Enter a security group name in the Security Group Name field.
examples.negative: Enter a security group name in the Security Group Name text box.

examples.negative: The instance is successfully created.

examples.negative: It is really easy to get started with Alibaba Cloud.

examples.positive: In the Create Migration Task dialog box, set the migration task parameters.

rule53.message: Do not use "is comprised of." Use "comprises", "is composed of", or "consists of."

examples.positive: The United States comprises 50 states.
examples.negative: The United States is comprised of 50 states.

examples.positive: The United States consists of 50 states.

rule54.message: Do not use "execute the xxx command."

examples.positive: You can run the following command to create a migration task:

rule55.message: Do not use "we", except in the sentence pattern "We recommend that you xxx."
rule55.correction: Change to: "you", or rewrite the sentence

examples.positive: If you want to create an ECS instance, open the Apsara Stack console.
examples.negative: If we want to create an ECS instance, open the Apsara Stack console.

examples.positive: Open the Apsara Stack console to create an ECS instance.

rule56.message: Use the sentence pattern "We recommend that you xxx."

examples.positive: We recommend that you clear the cache once a day.
examples.negative: It is recommended to clear the cache once a day.

examples.positive: We recommend that you perform the upgrade during off-peak hours.
examples.negative: Alibaba Cloud recommends that you perform the upgrade during off-peak hours.

rule57.message: Use the sentence pattern "We recommend that you do not xxx."

examples.positive: We recommend that you do not use "the" before product names.
examples.negative: We do not recommend that you use "the" before product names.

examples.positive: We recommend that you do not repeatedly perform this operation.
examples.negative: Alibaba Cloud does not recommend that you repeatedly perform this operation.

rule58.message: Do not join the trademark "Alibaba Cloud" with another word.

examples.positive: Use Logtail to collect logs from compute instances that are not Alibaba Cloud ECS instances.
examples.negative: Use Logtail to collect logs from non-Alibaba Cloud ECS instances.

rule59.message: Do not make the trademark "Alibaba Cloud" a possessive.

examples.positive: Tablestore is a NoSQL database service built on the Apsara distributed operating system of Alibaba Cloud.
examples.negative: Tablestore is a NoSQL database service built on Alibaba Cloud's Apsara distributed operating system.

rule60.message: The first letter of "cloud" must be capitalized.

rule61.message: The first letter of "platform" must be capitalized.

rule62.message: Do not add "the" in front of an Alibaba Cloud service name.

rule63.message: Do not use "a" in front of a noun that starts with a vowel.

rule64.correction: Remove "there be" and use other expressions.

rule65.correction: Remove "there be" and use other expressions.

rule68.message: Do not add quotation marks when you reference a document.

examples.positive: For more information, see XXX User Guide.
examples.negative: For more information, see "XXX User Guide."

rule70.message: Do not use curved quotation marks (“ ”).

rule71.message: Do not add a space in front of a colon.

rule72.message: Do not add a space in front of a "?", "!", ",", or "." in a sentence.

rule73.message: Do not use a wave line when quoting a range.

rule74.message: Do not add spaces in front of or after a dash when quoting a range.

rule75.message: Do not use a second punctuation mark after the closing quotation mark.

rule76.message: Add a space before and after mathematical symbols except the division sign.

rule77.message: Do not add a space before or after the division sign (/).

rule78.message: Do not add a space before or after the plus sign (+) in a keyboard shortcut combination.

examples.positive: Yearly sales grew to USD 300 million.
examples.negative: Yearly sales grew to USD300 million.

examples.positive: Yearly sales grew to USD 300 million.
examples.negative: Yearly sales grew to $300 million.

rule81.message: Do not add a space before the degree sign (°).

rule82.message: Do not add a space before and after a plus-minus sign (±).

rule83.message: Add a space before and after the ">", "<, "≥", and "≤" signs.

rule86.message: Do not use ellipses (…) except in GUIs.
rule86.correction: Use "for example" or "such as" when listing examples.

rule87.message: Do not use the exclamation point (!).
rule87.correction: Use a period (.) to indicate the end of a sentence.

rule88.message: Do not use the apostrophe to form contractions.
rule88.correction: Write out the words in full.

examples.positive: Do not delete the table entry.
examples.negative: Don't delete the table entry.

rule89.message: Do not use apostrophes (') to form the possessive case of product, service, or company names.

examples.positive: the benefits of ECS
examples.negative: ECS's benefits

examples.positive: Click the home button.
examples.negative: Click on the home button.

rule101.message: Do not use "to" after the verb "help."

examples.positive: This function helps you achieve the goal of remote disaster tolerance.
examples.negative: This function helps you to achieve the goal of remote disaster tolerance.

rule102.message: Do not use "to" after the verb "help."

examples.positive: This function helps you achieve the goal of remote disaster tolerance.
examples.negative: This function helps you to achieve the goal of remote disaster tolerance.

rule103.message: Do not use "onto", such as "onto the cloud."

examples.negative: Migrate your compute service onto Alibaba Cloud.

examples.negative: The user may not be able to activate this service.

examples.positive: You must specify this parameter.
examples.negative: It is required to specify this parameter.

examples.negative: Creates one or multiple instances.

examples.negative: Select any instance from the cluster.

examples.positive: For more information, see the style guide.
examples.negative: For more information, read our style guide.

examples.positive: data center
examples.negative: data centre

rule117.message: Keep a concord between the subject and predicate.

examples.positive: You can apply for a read/write splitting address.
examples.negative: You can apply for a read-write splitting address.

rule121.message: Do not use "on or off switch."

rule123.message: Do not use "(s)" to mean that a noun can be singular or plural.

rule124.message: Do not use "(s)" to mean that a noun can be singular or plural.

examples.negative: You can configure Nginx on the front end as an HTTPS proxy.

rule130.message: Differentiate the usage of "public networks" and "Internet".
rule130.correction: Change to: "Internet" if you are not referring to networks in public areas such as airports and bars.

rule134.message: Do not use "Before doing…, you must do…"

rule135.message: Do not use "After doing…, you must do…"

rule136.message: Do not use "When doing…, you must do…"

rule137.message: Spell out numbers from zero to nine before years.

examples.positive: four years
examples.negative: 4 years

rule138.message: Spell out numbers from zero to nine before months.

examples.positive: eight months
examples.negative: 8 months

rule139.message: Spell out numbers from zero to nine before days.

examples.positive: nine days
examples.negative: 9 days

rule140.message: Do not use internal names such as "Tianji" and "Pangu."

rule141.message: Do not use internal names such as "Tianji" and "Pangu."

rule142.message: Do not use jargon such as "network lag."

rule143.message: Do not use "How to" to start a question.

examples.positive: How do I monitor a task?
examples.negative: How to monitor a task?

rule144.message: If a colon is used in a heading, you must capitalize the first word after the colon.

examples.positive: Step 2: Create a bucket
examples.negative: Step 2: create a bucket

rule146.message: Use a question mark in the sentence pattern "What is xxx?"

examples.positive: What is ECS?
examples.negative: What is ECS

examples.positive: on-premises database
examples.negative: on-premise database

rule148.message: Do not use the divide symbol (÷).

examples.positive: Unit traffic price × (Time / Number of instances)

rule150.message: Add a space before and after mathematical symbols except the division sign.

rule153.message: Do not add a space between the numeral and seconds (s).

examples.positive: Latency cannot exceed 2s.
examples.negative: Latency cannot exceed 2 s.

rule154.message: Do not add a space between the numeral and milliseconds (ms).

examples.positive: Latency cannot exceed 5ms.
examples.negative: Latency cannot exceed 5 ms.

rule155.message: Do not add a space between the numeral and the percent sign (%).

rule156.message: Do not add a space between the numeral and the degree sign (°).

examples.positive: The upload speed is 128 Mbit/s.
examples.negative: The upload speed is 128 Mbps.

rule159.message: Do not use "describes the basic concepts."

examples.positive: This topic introduces the basic concepts related to ECS.
examples.negative: This topic describes the basic concepts related to ECS.

rule160.message: Do not use "greater than or equal to."

examples.positive: The file size of each image must be at least 2 MB.
examples.negative: The file size of each image must be greater than or equal to 2 MB.

rule161.message: Do not use "less than or equal to."

examples.positive: You must select an instance type that has 2 GB memory or larger.
examples.negative: You have to select an instance type that has 2 GB memory or higher.

rule165.message: Do not use "before" and "first" in the same sentence.

rule166.message: Do not use "before" and "first" in the same sentence.

examples.negative: LogHub can be integrated with CloudMonitor, Storm, Spark Streaming, and other services.

rule171.message: Do not use once in a temporal sense to mean "after."

rule177.message: Do not use "above" to refer to the location of material in a document.

examples.positive: See the preceding instructions.

rule178.message: Do not use "below" to refer to the location of material in a document.

examples.negative: See the examples below.
